dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: What brings you to this village?

dialogues.speaker: Guard
dialogues.text: Ah, a traveler. We don't get many of those around here.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: I'm just passing through. Is everything okay in the village?

dialogues.speaker: Guard
dialogues.text: Well... there have been some strange occurrences at night. Tools gone missing, fires set to waste...

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Do you think it's related to the recent stranger sightings?

dialogues.speaker: Guard
dialogues.text: I don't know... but I do know that we've had some... unsettling dreams lately.
